title: When do we get Teemo back?
body: Yo riot, What's the time frame to get my little general back on the park?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Teemo is currently disabled due to an in-game bug which gives teemo an unfair advantage. Teemo will not be re-enabled until this bug is resolved.

There is currently no ETA on a fix, however one is in the works.
